amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate with respect to air fares provided to members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 892 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 892 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S7785-7786; text: CR S7785) To express the sense of the Senate with respect to air fares provided to members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 892 proposed by Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 892 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
